description_text:
Just recieved the simpsonn pedals but the haptic reactors i havent recieved
yet, is the haptic reactor set sent in another shippment ? please let me
know thx

conversations.body_text:
I just confirmed , from my Operations Manager that only 1 package was
delivered this morning and the tracking says 2 was delivered can you look
into this ? Again thankyou for the support

On Tue, Oct 28, 2025, 12:35 PM service@simsonn.com

from my email if this helps.

On Tue, Oct 28, 2025, 12:42 PM Lauren Bergeron <laurenber72@gmail.com>
wrote:

> I just confirmed , from my Operations Manager that only 1 package was
> delivered this morning and the tracking says 2 was delivered can you look
> into this ? Again thankyou for the support
>
> On Tue, Oct 28, 2025, 12:35 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Lauren Bergeron,    We apologize for the inconvenience. We are currently confirming that two packages were shipped from our U.S. warehouse. Additionally, could you please provide a photo of the outer packaging?

On Wed, Oct 29, 2025, 4:20 PM Lauren Bergeron <laurenber72@gmail.com> wrote:  
 
 
  
 On Wed, Oct 29, 2025, 2:10 AM service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com> wrote: 
 
  

	 

 Hi Lauren Bergeron,  

 

 We apologize for the inconvenience. We are currently confirming that two packages were shipped from our U.S. warehouse. Additionally, could you please provide a photo of the outer packaging? 

 

  

 

       

 

                           

                            On

                            Tue, 28 Oct at  3:46 PM

                            ,  Lauren Bergeron <laurenber72@gmail.com>  wrote:

                              from my email if this helps.  

    

  

 On Tue, Oct 28, 2025, 12:42 PM Lauren Bergeron <laurenber72@gmail.com> wrote: 

 

 

 I just confirmed , from my Operations Manager that only 1 package was delivered this morning and the tracking says 2 was delivered can you look into this ? Again thankyou for the support  

  

 On Tue, Oct 28, 2025, 12:35 PM service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com> wrote: 

 

  

	

  

 Hi Lauren Bergeron 

 We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created. A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).  To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit  https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/5372?follow=email  Thank you for your patience. 

 

 View ticket 

 

If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/5372?follow=email

 

 

 Regards, simsonn Support Team
Hi Lauren Bergeron,    Thank you for your message. We are currently in contact with FedEx. We will notify you as soon as we have any updates.

Any update on this? fex x drpooed off 1 package confirmed at fed x website.
missing the haptic reactors

On Wed, Oct 29, 2025, 11:56 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Lauren Bergeron,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. FedEx is currently investigating the matter, and we have arranged for a replacement shipment. Here is your new tracking link:  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/no-results-found?trknbr=394896618281
